text: Jaafar Jeremiah Jackson (born July 25, 1996) is an American singer and the son of the late music legend Michael Jackson's brother, Jermaine Jackson. He is part of the Jackson family, known for their significant contributions to the music industry. Jaafar has been involved in music and entertainment and has pursued a career as a performer in his own right. While specific details about his career may evolve, he is often recognized for his connections to the Jackson legacy and his potential as an artist in the industry. He is set to make his cinematic debut by portraying his uncle Michael Jackson in the upcoming biopic Michael (2025). Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:American singers
title: Jaafar Jackson
